    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public java.lang.Object[] run(java.lang.String script,
                              java.lang.Object... args)
                       throws LuaException
        run a code chunk
        参数:
        script - a code chunk to be compiled and called
        args - optional parameters, but userdata will be converted to table in lua
        返回:
        results of the chunk if anything is returned or null
        抛出:
        LuaException

      • run

        public java.lang.Object[] run(java.io.File file,
                              java.lang.Object... args)
                       throws LuaException
        抛出:
        LuaException

      • call

        public java.lang.Object[] call(java.lang.String functionName,
                               java.lang.Object... args)
                        throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                               LuaException
        call a function with given arguments
        参数:
        functionName - a function declared in env
        args - arguments used by the function, userdata will be converted to table in lua
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        LuaException

      • runWithContext

        public java.lang.Object[] runWithContext(java.lang.String script,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> context,
                                         java.lang.Object... args)
                                  throws LuaException
        run a code chunk with context add to executor's env
        参数:
        script - a code chunk to be executed
        context - a key-value context add into env or replace existing value
        args - will be used if a function is called in the code chunk
        返回:
        抛出:
        LuaException

      • getFunction

        public net.sandius.rembulan.runtime.LuaFunction getFunction(java.lang.String name)
        get a lua function from executor's env
        参数:
        name - function's name
        返回:

      • putContext

        public void putContext(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> context)
        add context to executor's env
        参数:
        context - the key-value context add to env or replace existing value, userdata value will be converted to table in lua

      • toJavaObject

        public static <T> T toJavaObject(java.lang.Object luaResult,
                                 java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        convert non-userdata lua result to exact java class object
        类型参数:
        T - target java type
        参数:
        luaResult - a result returned by executing scripts
        clazz - target java class
        返回:
        a java object

      • toJavaList

        public static java.util.List toJavaList(java.lang.Object luaResult)
        convert lua table to java list, only number indexed value will be returned
        参数:
        luaResult - table indexed by number
        返回:
        number indexed value in list
